ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: Hollowshade? What do people hunt in hollowshade for smithing? Do you mean Dawnshroud Peaks? I know if hoppers are up and someone wants the gorangas up they
ygData.messageBody:
Hollowshade? What do people hunt in hollowshade for smithing?
Do you mean Dawnshroud Peaks? I know if hoppers are up and someone wants the
gorangas up they kill the age old hopper...
luv,
-Su

> One thing I've noticed is people usually call camp checks if they plan to
> camp a particular mob or they plan to do something that could effect the
> mobs in the zone aside from a few. Hollowshade is one example, there are
> mobs that people farm for substances to smith, however those same mobs can
> be replaced by new mobs that don't have the substances they want by just a
> few kills in one area. Usually if i was planning on hunting a pertucular
> mob that can be effected as such...i usually ask what camps anyone has to
> make sure i'm not going to interfer with them, but if noone replys what
can
> you do....noone can read their minds...they might tell me they were later,
> and often i appologize saying I asked but noone said anything..they
usually
> understand and we try to get the mobs they were hunting back if they
> despawned for another set. But those that don't pay attention sound like
> they are relying on a timer and not paying attention..thats not a true
camp
> IMHO. A camp is a site where someone is watching for the enemy...not
> relying on game programming to determine when that mob is there. I've
seen
> people sitting around the guys spawn point in QH a good hour or 2 before
his
> scedualed pop...just to make sure they tell anyone who shows up they are
> there.
